text: The Cote Blanche Bridge crosses Bayou Lafourche at West 79th Street in the town of Cut Off, Louisiana. Built in 1956, this steel pontoon bridge has a total length of with its largest span at . The bridge deck is wide. ==References== Category:Pontoon bridges in the United States Category:Road bridges in Louisiana Category:1956 establishments in Louisiana Category:Bridges completed in 1956
title: Cote Blanche Bridge
